description: A service template that contains performance KPIs for AWS EBS Volumes from metrics collected by AWS CloudWatch.

kpis.description: Provides information about the percentage of I/O credits (for gp2) or throughput credits (for st1 and sc1) remaining in the burst bucket. Data is reported to CloudWatch only when the volume is active. If the volume is not attached, no data is reported.
kpis.title: AWS/EBS Burst Balance

kpis.description: The number of read and write operation requests waiting to be completed in a specified period of time.
kpis.title: AWS/EBS Queue Length

kpis.description: The total number of seconds in a specified period of time when no read or write operations were submitted (default 15 minutes)
kpis.title: AWS/EBS Volume Idle Time

kpis.description: The average size of all write and write operation during the specified period (default 15 minutes)
kpis.title: AWS/EBS Volume Total I/O MB

kpis.description: The total number of seconds in a specified period of time servicing read and write operations (default 15 minutes)
kpis.title: AWS/EBS Volume Total I/O Time

kpis.description: The total number of read and write operations in a specified period of time (default 15 minutes)
kpis.title: AWS/EBS Volume Total Operations

title: Cloud KPIs - AWS EBS (SAI)

description: A service template that contains out-of-box KPIs for AWS EC2 based services imported from SAI.

kpis.description:
The percentage of allocated EC2 compute units that are currently in use on the instance. This metric identifies the processing power required to run an application upon a selected instance.

To use the percentiles statistic, you must enable detailed monitoring in AWS.
kpis.title: AWS/EC2 CPU Utilization %

kpis.description: Bytes read to and written from all instance store volumes available to the instance.
kpis.title: AWS/EC2 Disk Total I/O MB

kpis.description: Completed read and write operations to all instance store volumes available to the instance in a specified period of time.
kpis.title: AWS/EC2 Disk Total I/O Operations

kpis.description: The number of megabytes sent and received on all network interfaces by the instance. This metric identifies the volume of network traffic for a single instance.
kpis.title: AWS/EC2 Network Total I/O MB

kpis.description: The number of packets sent and received on all network interfaces by the instance. This metric identifies the volume of incoming traffic in terms of the number of packets on a single instance.
kpis.title: AWS/EC2 Network Total Packets

kpis.description:
Reports whether the instance has passed both the instance status check and the system status check in the last minute.

This metric can be either 0 (passed) or 1 (failed).
kpis.title: AWS/EC2 Status Checks Failed

title: Cloud KPIs - AWS EC2 (SAI)

description: A service template that contains out-of-box KPIs for *nix based services imported from SAI.

kpis.description: Amount of time in ms disk operations have taken to complete plus the amount of time to service the rest of the queue
kpis.title: Disk IO Weighted Time

kpis.description: Percentage of time the CPU has waited for disk operations to complete
kpis.title: IO Wait %

kpis.description: Total network errors for both rx and tx operations
kpis.title: Network Errors

kpis.description: Percent of total packets I/O that were dropped
kpis.title: Network Packet Drop %

title: OS KPIs - *nix (SAI)

description: A service template that contains out-of-box KPIs for Windows based services imported from SAI.

kpis.description: Percent of time reading and writing to/from disk
kpis.title: % Disk I/O Time

kpis.description: Percentage of disk/storage space available on the host
kpis.title: % Free Disk Space

kpis.description: % of bytes that have been allocated by processes, and to which the operating system has committed a RAM page frame or a page slot in the page file
kpis.title: % Memory Committed in Use

kpis.description: Amount of megabytes received and sent across all network interfaces on the host per second
kpis.title: Network I/O MBs

kpis.description: Total number of packets sent and received across all network interfaces per second
kpis.title: Network I/O Packets per Second

kpis.description: Percentage of time the processor has been in an active (non-idle) state
kpis.title: Processor Active Time %

kpis.description: Number of threads in the processor queue waiting for disk operations
kpis.title: Processor Queue Length

title: OS KPIs - Windows (SAI)
